rows.label: qst702502_msg0001
rows.name:
Monsters are raiding the harbor!
They came right out of nowhere!

rows.label: qst702502_msg0002
rows.name:
Most of our fighting forces are out
on other duties too... Good thing
you showed up, or we'd be done!

rows.label: qst702502_msg0003
rows.name:
I've got the lookout post covered.
Let me know if you need something!

rows.label: qst702502_msg0101
rows.name:
More monsters are coming in
from the opposite side now!

rows.label: qst702502_msg0102
rows.name:
This lot aren't regular local
monsters either! Where could
they have come from...?

rows.label: qst702502_msg0201
rows.name:
Even more monsters! If it keeps up
like this, they'll overwhelm us!

rows.label: qst702502_msg0202
rows.name:
We've evacuated most of the
area now. All that's left is
to take out these creatures!

rows.label: qst702502_msg0203
rows.name:
One last push and we'll
be rid of them. I believe
in you, Your Majesty!
